subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Coming off a 15-win season, Oliver Pérez has regressed, pitching poorly in three straight starts. The nadir came Monday night, when he was pulled with one out in the first inning.
snippet: Coming off a 15-win season, Oliver Pérez has regressed, pitching poorly in three straight starts. The nadir came Monday night, when he was pulled with one out in the first inning.
